response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us, but its true worth to you is even greater. We are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000, which we believe strikes a fair balance between our valuation and your perceived worth of the product. We understand that such an investment is significant, and we are confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you decide to proceed, we assure you of our full support throughout the transaction. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
